post.title: Haven't been here for a while!
post.body: Hello, everybody! I started to learn JS a couple of month ago and I'd like to publish here some short articles about this sometimes... About this. This? What this is reffered to here? Arrghh, not again... :)

post.title: Search is needed
post.body: Like in first years of Internet you can make anything but nobody cant find it. Google-ish Zeronet search is definitely needed, at least for sites with .bit domains. Is it possible to do the same search for sites without domains? If site has only bitcoin key, how can you find it if you don't know this key? As I can imagine, you need just to look for new keys in every peer in network.
